features: 🎀[Interesting Toddlers Learning Toys]：The toddler card learning toy is designed specifically for children with a pink card reader and 112 cards (224 visual words). Including 12 learning categories such as letters, numbers, animals and 1 piece of music.It's suitable for 4 years old boys and girls. And helps to improve their language and listening comprehension abilities.

🎈[Convenient And Easy To Use]：This talking card learning toy is easy to operate, just insert the card into the card reader slot to play the content on the card. It has a repeat read button to repeat the sound and is simple to use. Compact and portable. Easy to carry. Wherever children go, this talking preschool machine will take them with it.

🎉[Stimulate Toddler's Language Talent]：The size of the educational flash card is 3.15 * 2.36*1.26 inches, bright colors，easy for young children to use, waterproof and odorless.The volume can also be adjusted according to the child's listening characteristics. It is the best learning tool to help children stimulate their language talent and correct incorrect accents that occur during the vocal process.

💖[USB Rechargeable And Safe]：The toddler's early education learning toy adopts safe and reliable USB charging technology, wireless use and does not require WIFI. Can automatically shut down to extend the battery life. Don't worry about battery emissions.Product shell surface smooth design to ensure the safety of toddlers.

🎁[Prefect Childhood Education Gift]：The children's speech therapy toy is an ideal Christmas gift, birthday gift, and holiday gift for children aged 4. 4 years old is the glottic stage of brain memory and language development, which requires a simple and interesting interactive educational toy. It can help children effectively remember words and enhance family parent-child interaction.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Interesting Toys For Early Childhood Education And Learning - Making Children's Lives More Fun And Interesting！ Our Talking Flash Cards Learning Toys refers to the exploration of their talents and a series of factors that stimulate their desire to speak, which can better assist them in improving their language perception ability.

An Prefect Gift for 2-4 Years Old Boys and Girls Product Name：Talking Flash Cards Learning Toys Device Size：4 x 3.5 x 1.8 inches Device weight：10.5 ounces Flash Cards：112 psc Sight Words：224 Colour：Pink & Blue Charging method：USB cable

Insert Flash Card Put the card into the card reader for easy operation. Automatically Read Card Words The children educational learning cards machine automatically recognizes the words on the card and reads them out loud. Circular Reading Function And Volume Adjustment Press the left button to repeatedly read the words on the card, and press the right button to freely adjust the volume of the card reader.

Unique Design The children's card reader adopts a safety design process specifically designed for kids , making it safer and more convenient for children aged 2-4 to use. Not only can it correct children's pronunciation, but it can also enhance their spelling ability. Package Content Our toy includes a reader mechanic, 112 flash cards , instructions, and USB cable.The Best Gift for boys and girls. Perfect Learning Toys The card reader is a very suitable preschool education toy for self-learning. No need to connect to the internet to protect children's eyes. Let your child learn while playing. Improve children's language perception and memory.

If you are still struggling with choosing a gift for a child aged 234 , our toddler's card reader is a good choice. The blue style is suitable for giving to boys. The pink color is suitable for giving to girls. It is the perfect choice for Christmas gifts, holiday gifts, and birthday gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my toddler learning
reviews.reviewText: I like that the product was easy to use, the pictures on the cards were large enough and colourful enough to grab my toddlers attention. I would recommend this toy for all toddlers. Helps a lot with language development also, the voice on the toy is clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to learn for Toddler!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my grandbaby to help her with her learning. The talking flash cards alpha pocket came with many cards including different animals, colors, shapes, etc. My grandbaby really enjoys it when it reads what's on the card for her to follow. You can also adjust the volume. It's a perfect size for her to carry it around especially in a long car ride. I recommend this product for toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very useful thing for a child
reviews.reviewText: My child loved this toy very much, and I am grateful to the seller for it, I recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great learning product
reviews.reviewText: This is a great learning device for my toddler! He loves picking out new cards and trying new words. Sound quality is great, and there is plenty of bright colors. It’s the perfect size to take on the go too! Took off one star because cards aren’t as durable as I’d like, but overall great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works just as described.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a 2 year old granddaughter who loves to practice her talking. She's good at manifesting small objects so is adept at placing the cards in the machine, which then reads the word. She enjoys it for about 10 minutes at a time.I sorted through the cards first, pulling out words that she's not familiar with or words that have different meaning in British English. She plays with about 15 words at a time, and I add a few each session. My hope is that she'll"accidentally" learn to recognize the word as well as the picture.It's a nice activity, small enough for the car or a restaurant and well worth the reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old loves this and it’s easy for her to use by herself. She just loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great however weird smell
reviews.reviewText: Got this as a christmas present for my niece. It functioned well and will be a great learning tool. My only complaint would be it had a weird odor to the plastic and the smell transferred to your hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this affordable portable toy! Helping my kiddies talk!
reviews.reviewText: This talking flashcards card is genius! I am an occupational therapist and have been using it to help my kids address speech, cognition and fine motor skills. It is so easy for me to transport from kid to kid, the sound quality is very good for the price, and it holds a charge for a while so I don’t have to plug it in often since I’m always on the go. One of the parents let me know their daughter is already starting to talk using the flashcards every day. The pictures and variety of items on the cards are very good quality as well, i highly recommend this product to others!
